dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3548711U] Takedown Request for Copyright Violation on livelonely.com
dmca.body:
What do I need to do to comply with the required notification elements
of the DMCA?  I don't want to hire a lawyer as it is not worth my money.
Can you recommend ammendments?

I outlined in clear english, with evidence, my complaint against a site
(livelonely.com) that you are hosting.  Please help me fix this clear
violation of my copyright.  

Please advise.

Best,
Andrew Parker

-----Original Message-----
From: Copyright [mailto:copyright@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 20, 2007 2:52 PM
To: Andrew Parker
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3548711U] Takedown Request for Copyright
Violation on livelonely.com

To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

 (multipart/alternative)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
Hi, 
 
You are the service provider for a site that is currently violating my 
copyright.   
 
I am the owner and author of all content at http://blog.andrewparker.net

 
You are hosting a spam blog at http://livelonely.com .  This spam blog
is stealing my content directly through my RSS feed, and republishing in

on his/her site in full, and advertising against my content.  I do not
appreciate that he is stealing my content in full and monetizing it.  In

doing so, he is also removing my own advertising from my feed.   
 
There is no contact info for livelonely.com available on the site and
the whois information is blocked by "whois guard," so I'm contacting you

to find someone accountable and reachable regarding the violation of my 
copyright.   
 
Please ensure that your customer ceases and desists immediately.  Please

advise. 
 
Best,
Andrew Parker 
 
Andrew Parker
Union Square Ventures - Analyst
915 Broadway, Suite 1408
New York, NY 10010
p: 212.994.7880
f: 212.994.7399
e: Andrew@unionsquareventures.com
